sent.orig: To understand oneself must observe others' actions, to understand others must observe your heart.
sent.trans: 要想了解自己，就要观察别人的行为；要想了解别人，就请体察你自己的心吧！

sent.orig: OBSERVE Did you observe anything strange in that boy's behavior?
sent.trans: 你观察到那男孩的行为有什么奇怪的地方吗。

sent.orig: Aim: To observe the effect of semiconductor laser treatment on vocal cords leukoplakia.
sent.trans: 目的：观察半导体激光治疗声带粘膜白斑的临床效果。

sent.orig: Objective To observe the curative effect of electrical acupuncture on ischiodynia dampness type.
sent.trans: 目的观察电热针治疗寒湿型坐骨神经痛的疗效。

sent.orig: It is an indicator to observe the loss that occurs during the process of energy conversion.
sent.trans: 它是观察能源在加工转换过程中损失量变化的指标。
